casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Johnnie L. HARRINGTON. No. 441P92-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. Derrick C. Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Susan Doyle, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of February 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2007."
